===JQuery Color Picker Plugin as Wicket behavior example===

*[http://www.eyecon.ro/colorpicker/ Original javascript version can be found here]*

*Prerequisites:* Your wicket application is configured to use JQWicket as described in the [http://code.google.com/p/jqwicket "Quick Start"] guide.

*Description:* This example demonstrates how to integrate JQuery Color Picker Plugin with the wicket components using JQWicket.

http://jqwicket.googlecode.com/svn-history/r296/wiki/colorpicker_example.png


*Java-Code:*
{{{
public class ColorPickerPage extends WebPage {
	public ColorPickerPage() {
		add(new ColorPickerTextField<String>("colorpicker"));
	}
}

}}}

*Html-Template:*
{{{
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN"
	"http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"
	xmlns:wicket="http://wicket.apache.org/" xml:lang="en" lang="en">
<head>
<title>Color Picker example</title>
</head>
<body> 
<div class="demo">
	<p>Color: <input type="text" wicket:id="colorpicker"/></p>
</div>
</body>
</html>
}}}

*Rendered Html:*
{{{
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN"
	"http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xml:lang="en" lang="en">
<head>
<title>Color Picker example</title>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.4.4/jquery.min.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="resources/net.javaforge.jqwicket.ui.colorpicker.ColorPickerOptions/js/colorpicker.js"></script>
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="resources/net.javaforge.jqwicket.ui.colorpicker.ColorPickerOptions/css/colorpicker.css" />
<script type="text/javascript" id="b4a69179-4c9c-4425-b445-fc8bf8a04850"><!--/*--><![CDATA[/*><!--*/
$(document).ready(function(){$('#colorpicker1').keyup(function(){$(this).ColorPickerSetColor(this.value);});
$('#colorpicker1').ColorPicker({onSubmit:function(hsb,hex,rgb,el){$(el).val(hex);$(el).ColorPickerHide();}, onBeforeShow:function(){$(this).ColorPickerSetColor(this.value);}});});
/*-->]]>*/</script>
</head>
<body> 
<div class="demo">
	<p>Color: <input type="text" value="" name="colorpicker" id="colorpicker1"/></p>
</div>
</body>
</html>
}}}
